0.1.4.name: wordpress/wordpress-gallery-slideshow
0.1.4.description:
NextGEN Gallery another plugin for WordPress by Alex Rabe was the inspiration for this small and simple plugin. I really must say he did and still does a great job with this plugin but sometimes such a huge plugin is simply too much. So I decided to develop a small plugin with less configuration settings and no extra tables for the WordPress Database. Simplicity should be the guide for the advanture of developing this plugin. As far as I can say I did the job well and it is just a Slideshow to set your images in the right context. Nothing more nothing less.

Live demo, description and everyting else you need.
